Author: hua_hui
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Hi Cofounder Kunal Barchha, if you are the same KunalBarchha as i just spoke to in telegram, i am super disappoint in you and this definitely put a bad taste in this ICO.  I shall elaborate on what happen, my partner has reached out to Kunal Barchha in telegram, and he accused me of having a fake account. When I asked him on the basis on why it is so, he just brush it off because of my telegram handler. I have this telegram handler handler since a long time ago and this has been the same telegram handler when i work with many reputable ICOs. I have no such issue with any other ICO Cofounders at all. Instead of giving any chance for people to explain, Kunal block me in pm and even kick me out of their Telegram ICO (i did not even speak a word in the telegram).  I believe i am quite reputatable in crypto space. Just based on this account, anyone can see that I have handled a lot of reputatable ICOs. Let me list some of the example.  Gifto - Sold out 10mil of crowdsale within a few mins, first ico to be on Binance launchpad. (Binance is the number 1 crypto exchange and it is extremely difficult for any tokens to be listed on its exchange) Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2356301.msg24009889#msg24009889 News to prove : https://www.cryptoninjas.net/2017/12/14/gifto-sells-token-sale-within-one-minute/ And my telegram handler was once an admin in Gifto to assist during the pre-crowdsale period.  Zilliqa - Scaling solution for ETH transaction issue. X14 in price from its ico price. Zilliqa having 17k members right now. Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2367256.msg24134313#msg24134313  Olympus Labs - For starters, Olympus Labs has been named as one of the Top 5 Most influential Financial Blockchain Companies! Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2408428.msg24630320#msg24630320 News : https://insiderfinancial.com/top-five-most-influential-financial-blockchain-companies  Linkeye - Listed on Huobi, built on the Achain Platform, 11k telegram members Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2437755.msg24971596#msg24971596  IHT - Has support from Mcafee, team with background in Microsoft, Yahoo, Baidu, Xiaomi. Advisor with IBM and Morgan Stanley. Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2572759.msg26208614#msg26208614  Aidoc - Long awaiting ICO from influence ICO graders. Listed on over 10 exchanges. Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2620454.msg26664072#msg26664072  Policypal Network - Listed as one of the top ico. It is in OhHeyMatt, Gobone and Cryptomoon list. Telegram is now at 24k. Private sale is oversubscribed. Do check it out on the upcoming crowdsale.  Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2728683.msg27931246#msg27931246 News : https://crushcrypto.com/policypal-ico-review/  Sentinel Chain - Even without any bounty or airdrop, we manage to grow Sentinel Chain to 13k members strong in telegram. Private sale is over subscribed and they are also listed in all the top ico grading list. Do stay tune for the upcoming crowdsale. Thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2797679.msg28600694#msg28600694 News : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FeUw_Sqk9TU  There are more projects that i deal with and they knew me even though my nick in telegram.  As we are still supporting Policypal Network and Sentinel Chain in their ico phrase, feel free to join these telegram and ask for my telegram handler. I am sure they are able to tell you more.

Author: kunalbarchha
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Dear Sir,  First of all, having "Nameless name" is skeptical in its own ways. Your partner / friend didn't mention any sort of detail. He just said you are a "Legendary" member on BitcoinTalk, which is not enough, he did not even share your bitcointalk user name. I also asked you to share your real name, which you laughed off saying "This is how I judge people?"  We are dealing with money and obviously this small things do matter. If you cannot disclose your real name, there is no way I am going to trust you.  You can spam every possible forum of KALI Coin just like you did by joining our Telegram group, and putting on messages on our website Chats.  The fact is we do not want to have any deal further.  Hope you understand and let it go.  Thanks, Kunal Barchha.

Author: hua_hui
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Partner : My partner was busy with other project couldnt attend to you yesterday, i hope i am able to clear ay doubts you have, do let me know if you require further assistance Partner: Do you think will you be interested in this campaign? Anyway to add on abit more.... All the cost will be on us for now You : Need to talk with some real person first Nameless name, and gold coinshinny aren't real persons Partner: how you define real person? we are real person though for your info You : Sorry, we can't take this forward  Well i am wondering which part of this conversation talks about giving us a chance to clarify. We are clarifying with you on what basis do you define as real person so we can give evidence.    This is our private message.  Me: Hi. How do you judge that i am not real person? Ever heard of the following ico? Gifto Zilliqa Policypal network And 10 over icos? Done by blockfolks? Www.blockfolks.com You : Nameless Name as your display name tells it all. Me : Lol. Is that how you judge? You : Yes, someone who isn't showing his real name is not trust worthy. Sorry good bye  Obviously as you can see, you are the one having bias and i am trying to show evidence to you.

Author: hua_hui
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Well, now you are trying to find excuses for yourself. Do I now need to line by line to discuss with you on the interpretation?  For example, when you say this 'Nameless Name as your display name tells it all.' What makes it sound like you are still giving me a chance to clarify things. Or rather to say, which sentence tells me that you are giving people a chance to clarify.  And no need to explain to me about receiving message, I receiving it more than you. Just on bitcointalk, i already have like 20-40pm per days for different ico that i am in charge of.  Just to teach you another tips, if you want people to let it go, you must be humble and willing to work things out. From your message, you still put yourself on top and giving excuses while expecting people to let it go. Please go and learn from other Cofounder on how they deal with problems, you have a lot to learn.

Author: kunalbarchha
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Sir,  You might again call it an excuse, but the first thing that bothered we was that your partner offered free service.  Second, he didn't share any link.  Anyways, if you feel I have offended you, pls accept my apologies.  It is just communication misunderstanding.

Author: kunalbarchha
Title: [ANN ICO] KALI COIN ECOSYSTEM Unique Country Specific Fiat-to-Crypto Exchange
Body: Guidelines for sending BTC / ETH / BCH to KALI Coin ICO:  Hello!  The KALI Coin distribution event will start today, February 13, 2018, 9:00 P.M. Indian Standard Time exclusively on https://www.kalicoin.io  (Please make sure you are on the correct web address)  The KALI Coin distribution event will be capped at 15 million KALI Coins. The Private sale will end as soon as 15 Million KALI coins are sold out and users will then have to wait for Pre-ICO round in order to purchase KALI Coins.  As it is a private sale, minimum participation amount is set at $1000 for every user. Later in Pre-ICO, $250 will be the minimum purchase, while in the main ICO event; $100 will be the minimum participating amount.  Before we move forward, there are few things every user should consider:  1. BTC transactions will need two confirmations to reflect in your KALI Coin website wallet. 2. Ether transactions will need three confirmations before they are displayed. 3. Bitcoin Cash transactions will also need three confirmations to successfully reflect under your account balance on KALI Coin website. 4. Time taken to display balance of respective accepted currency purely depends on that particular network. In general, BTC will take a little more time compared to the other two. Users should not panic and wait until their KALI Coin account shows them the required balance. 5. Every user will have a unique deposit address of respective crypto currency and thus, you should not share it with anyone. The user will only get KALI Coins if he makes the purchase from his registered account and sends funds to the address given under his account. 6. Users can send funds from any wallet and that means, either from an exchange or from other-third party wallet. 7. There is a flat 0.50% fees on all transactions charge.   Most of the guidelines have already been mentioned in our article on how to participate in KALI Coin ICO on Medium - @KALICoin. However, in the next step youâ€™ll need to deposit accepted crypto currency in the wallet created under your account at KALI Coin user panel.  Once BTC / ETH / BCH balance is displayed in your account, you just have to purchase KALI coins using the purchase section given right below the wallet. In any case if you need any assistance, you can connect with us on:  Telegram: @KALICoin or E-Mail: Marketing@Kalicoin.io / Kunal@Kalicoin.io
